page.title: 02Life In Upton.
page.content: As you first go into Upton there are new{bungalows.}As you get further in the houses are older.There are{very {few shops}in Upton.Some of Upton is taken up by{derelict land}which used to be a{colliery.}When the colliery was there Upton was a busy place.In Upton there are not many places of work, there is only{one factory}which makes ladies clothes.Most people that live in Upton have{to travel}to their places of work which are mostly South Elmsall and South Kirkby.Upton is {surrounded by countryside. We carried out an interview with an Upton family,{see page 17. {
